name: part_003
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the song 'Ready Steady Go!' on a stage decorated with traditional Japanese elements and her 'Poyoyo' mascots.
MC section where Nakiri Ayame thanks the audience for joining her 4th-anniversary live and shows off the stage decorations.

subtitles.original: ...なみだもあとが いつだってつぎのsunrise
subtitles.english: ...and even after the tears, it's always the next sunrise.

subtitles.original: 君と High High High High
subtitles.english: With you, High High High High

subtitles.original: 憧れてたあの夢まで
subtitles.english: Until that dream we yearned for

subtitles.original: 続くように Brand new day story
subtitles.english: Let's continue, it's a brand new day story

subtitles.original: Ready Steady Go!
subtitles.english: Ready Steady Go!

subtitles.original: 君と手をつなごう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands

subtitles.original: ギュッと離れない思いも
subtitles.english: Feelings that won't ever let go

subtitles.original: 高め合げたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to raise them up

subtitles.original: さあ顔を上げて
subtitles.english: Come on, look up

subtitles.original: 心に形があるなら
subtitles.english: If my heart had a physical form

subtitles.original: 傷ついた場所すぐに woah woah
subtitles.english: I'd immediately tend to the wounded parts, woah woah

subtitles.original: 手当てしてあげたいけど
subtitles.english: I want to treat them for you, but...

subtitles.original: 大切なものはいつだって
subtitles.english: Important things are always...

subtitles.original: 目には見えないのが道理 woah woah
subtitles.english: ...invisible, that's just how it is, woah woah

subtitles.original: 君のこと知りたいのに be alright
subtitles.english: Even though I want to know about you, be alright

subtitles.original: 体中 空の果てへと be alright
subtitles.english: My whole body to the edge of the sky, be alright

subtitles.original: いつも真っさらな明日へと
subtitles.english: Always toward a brand-new tomorrow

subtitles.original: キャンバスへと繋がってるの
subtitles.english: Connected to a canvas

subtitles.original: 行くよ High High High High
subtitles.english: Here I go, High High High High

subtitles.original: きっと飛べるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can fly

subtitles.original: Ready Steady Go!
subtitles.english: Ready Steady Go!

subtitles.original: やっと笑ってくれたら
subtitles.english: If you finally smile for me

subtitles.original: ここで sunrise
subtitles.english: There'll be a sunrise right here

subtitles.original: 君と High High High High
subtitles.english: With you, High High High High

subtitles.original: 一緒に見たあの夢まで
subtitles.english: Until that dream we saw together

subtitles.original: 続いていく Never-ending story
subtitles.english: Continuing as a never-ending story

subtitles.original: Ready Steady Go!
subtitles.english: Ready Steady Go!

subtitles.original: 夢なら覚めた瞬間 始まるんじゃない
subtitles.english: It doesn't just start when you wake from a dream

subtitles.original: そこにたどり着くことは決めた日に
subtitles.english: The day you decided to reach that place...

subtitles.original: 始まっていると私は思うの
subtitles.english: ...is when it actually began, I think

subtitles.original: 傷跡涙もいつか輝く
subtitles.english: Scars and tears will one day shine

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 いつでもそばにいるよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, I'll always be by your side

subtitles.original: つまずいたって 何度も立ち止まっても
subtitles.english: Even if you stumble or stop many times

subtitles.original: 君とならばどんな景色も
subtitles.english: If I'm with you, any scenery...

subtitles.original: 美しいと思えることもわかってるから
subtitles.english: ...will look beautiful, I know that for a fact

subtitles.original: 行くよ High High High High
subtitles.english: Here I go, High High High High

subtitles.original: きっと飛べるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can fly

subtitles.original: Ready Steady Go!
subtitles.english: Ready Steady Go!

subtitles.original: なみだもあとが
subtitles.english: And even after the tears...

subtitles.original: いつだってつぎのsunrise
subtitles.english: ...it's always the next sunrise

subtitles.original: 君と High High High High
subtitles.english: With you, High High High High

subtitles.original: 憧れてたあの夢まで
subtitles.english: Until that dream we yearned for

subtitles.original: 続くように Brand new day story
subtitles.english: Let's continue, it's a brand new day story

subtitles.original: Ready Steady Go!
subtitles.english: Ready Steady Go!

subtitles.original: 君と手をつなごう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands

subtitles.original: ギュッと離れない思いも
subtitles.english: Feelings that won't ever let go

subtitles.original: 高め合げたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to raise them up

subtitles.original: さあ顔を上げて
subtitles.english: Come on, look up

subtitles.original: Ready Steady Ready Go!
subtitles.english: Ready Steady Ready Go!

subtitles.original: はぁ〜！皆さん！来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Haa~! Everyone! Thank you so much for coming!

subtitles.original: １曲目は『病名恋ワズライ』、
subtitles.english: The first song was 'Byoumei Koiwazurai',

subtitles.original: ２曲目は『 ODDS&ENDS 』、
subtitles.english: the second song was 'ODDS&ENDS',

subtitles.original: ３曲目は『 Ready Steady Go! 』でした！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: and the third song was 'Ready Steady Go!' Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、百鬼あやめ４周年記念ということで、
subtitles.english: Today marks Nakiri Ayame's 4th anniversary,

subtitles.original: いっぱい歌って踊らせていただきたいと思いますよ！
subtitles.english: so I'm going to sing and dance a whole lot!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、皆さんちょっと気づ... きづい... 気づいてみましたか？
subtitles.english: And also, everyone, did you happen to... notice... did you notice?

subtitles.original: ちょっとステージ上ね、ちょっと見てほしいんですけど...
subtitles.english: I'd like you to take a look at the stage for a bit...

subtitles.original: わぁ！わぁ！ね！これ見てください！この後ろにね、いっぱい付いてるんです！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Whoa! Hey! Look at this! There are so many things back here!

subtitles.original: 端っこにはね、この大きいぽよ余もいて、可愛いんですよ、これ。ちょっと見えますか？
subtitles.english: On the edges, there are these big Poyoyos. They're so cute. Can you see them?

subtitles.original: 見えますか、これ？見て！
subtitles.english: Can you see this? Look!

subtitles.original: このぽよ余がぽよぽよしてるんですよ。可愛いでしょう？
subtitles.english: These Poyoyos are bouncing around. Aren't they cute?

subtitles.original: ぽよぽよぽよぽよ...
subtitles.english: Poyopoyopoyopoyo...

subtitles.original: ぽよぽよってしてます、これ。両端にいてね、作っていただきました。ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: They're going 'poyopoyo'. They're on both sides. I had them made for me. Thank you!

subtitles.original: ね、この端っこにもいっぱい装飾も付いていて、
subtitles.english: See, there are lots of decorations on the edges too,

subtitles.original: ね、この傘も可愛いでしょう？
subtitles.english: and these umbrellas are cute too, right?

subtitles.original: この目の前にもね、傘があるんですよ、傘が。見て見て！
subtitles.english: There are even umbrellas right in front of me. Look, look!

subtitles.original: 見て見て、可愛い可愛い！わぁ、可愛い、やったー！
subtitles.english: Look, look, so cute, so cute! Wow, they're cute, yay!

subtitles.original: ということでですね、あの、４周年、本当に皆さんのおかげで迎えられました！
subtitles.english: And so, I've truly been able to reach my 4th anniversary thanks to all of you!

subtitles.original: もう、ありがとうございます！ということでね...
subtitles.english: Really, thank you so much! Now then...
